name: Create new rows on Google Sheets for Ledger Entries on Etsy
description: Make will automatically add a new row to a Google Sheet from ledger entries on Etsy. This example uses the Google Sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/184NyHGwUraPaxYvN090JkIJwkZi4kk35uyoR6P3nxKA/edit#gid=0). This scenario may be scheduled for every first day in a month.
